TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpPostedFile extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对客户端已上载的单独文件的访问。

span.span: Provides access to individual files that have been uploaded by a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对从客户端上载为文件集合的所有文件的访问权限。The class provides access to all the files that are uploaded from a client as a file collection. 类提供属性和方法，以获取有关单个文件的信息并读取和保存该文件。The class provides properties and methods to get information about an individual file and to read and save the file. 控件可用于从客户端选择并上传文件。The control can be used to select and upload files from a client. 文件以 MIME 多部分/窗体数据格式上传。Files are uploaded in MIME multipart/form-data format. 默认情况下，所有请求（包括表单字段和上传的文件256）均缓冲到磁盘，而不是保留在服务器内存中。By default, all requests, including form fields and uploaded files, larger than 256 KB are buffered to disk, rather than held in server memory. 您可以通过访问 属性或设置 Machine.config 或 web.config 文件中的[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))元素的 `maxRequestLength` 特性来指定允许的最大请求大小。You can specify the maximum allowable request size by accessing the property or by setting the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) element within the Machine.config or Web.config file. 默认值为 4 MB。The default is 4 MB. 对于包含文件上载的请求，在服务器内存中缓冲的数据量可以通过访问 属性或设置 Machine.config 或 web.config 文件中的[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))元素的 `requestLengthDiskThreshold` 特性来指定。The amount of data that is buffered in server memory for a request, which includes file uploads, can be specified by accessing the property or by setting the `requestLengthDiskThreshold` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) element within the Machine.config or Web.config file. 通过调整 和 属性，可以微调服务器的性能。By adjusting the and properties, you can fine tune the performance of your server. 此外，还应考虑设置 ，以防止用户将大型文件发布到服务器导致拒绝服务攻击。Additionally, you should consider setting the to prevent denial of service attacks caused by users posting large files to the server. 当请求结束时，分配给缓冲上载文件的服务器资源将被销毁。Server resources that are allocated to buffer the uploaded file will be destroyed when the request ends. 若要保存该文件的持久副本，请使用 方法。To save a durable copy of the file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLength As Integer
public: property int ContentLength { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取已上载文件的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets the size of an uploaded file, in bytes.

value.span: 文件长度（以字节为单位）。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentType As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取客户端发送的文件的 MIME 内容类型。

span.span: Gets the MIME content type of a file sent by a client.

value.span: 上载文件的 MIME 内容类型。

span.span: The MIME content type of the uploaded file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何遍历上传的文件集合中的所有文件，并在 `US-ASCII`MIME 类型的文件时执行操作。The following code example shows how to loop through all the files in the uploaded file collection and take action when the MIME type of a file is `US-ASCII`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.ContentType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取客户端上文件的完全限定名称。

span.span: Gets the fully qualified name of the file on the client.

value.span: 客户端的文件的名称，包含目录路径。

span.span: The name of the client's file, including the directory path.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将上传的文件（文件集合中的第一个文件）的名称分配给字符串变量。The following code example demonstrates how to assign the name of an uploaded file (the first file in the file collection) to a string variable. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.FileName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputStream As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ InputStream { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象指向一个上载文件，以准备读取该文件的内容。

span.span: Gets a object that points to an uploaded file to prepare for reading the contents of the file.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将客户端文件集合中第一个文件的内容读入一个字节数组，然后将该字节数组复制到一个字符串。The following code example shows how to read the contents of the first file in the client's file collection into a byte array, and then copy the byte array to a string. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.InputStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename) cil managed

span.span: The name of the saved file.

summary.span: 保存已上载文件的内容。

span.span: Saves the contents of an uploaded file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，请求允许的最大大小（包括上传的文件）为 4 MB。The maximum size allowed for a request, which includes uploaded files, is 4 MB, by default. 可以在 machine.config 或 web.config 文件中的[HttpRuntime 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))元素的 `maxRequestLength` 特性中指定最大请求大小。Maximum request size can be specified in the Machine.config or Web.config file in the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) element. 可以使用 Web.config 文件中的[Location 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b6x6shw7(v=vs.100))元素指定特定页面的最大请求大小。The maximum request size for a specific page can be specified using the [location Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b6x6shw7(v=vs.100)) element in a Web.config file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将客户端上传的所有文件保存到 Web 服务器本地磁盘上的 C:\TempFiles 文件夹中。The following code example demonstrates how to save all the files that are uploaded by the client to the C:\TempFiles folder on the Web server's local disk. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpPostedFile.SaveAs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 对象的 属性设置为 ，但 不是绝对路径。

span.span: The property of the object is set to , but is not an absolute path.
